drinks.name: Mojito
drinks.description: A refreshing mix of rum, mint, and lime
drinks.longDescription: The Mojito is a traditional Cuban highball. The cocktail often consists of five ingredients: white rum, sugar, lime juice, soda water, and mint.
instructions: Muddle mint leaves with simple syrup in a glass
Add rum, lime juice, and ice
Stir well
Top with soda water
Garnish with mint sprig and lime wheel

drinks.name: Margarita
drinks.description: A zesty blend of tequila, lime, and salt
drinks.longDescription: The Margarita is a Mexican-inspired cocktail made with tequila, lime, and triple sec. It's often served with salt on the rim of the glass.
instructions: Rim glass with salt
Combine tequila, lime juice, and triple sec in a shaker with ice
Shake well
Strain into the prepared glass
Garnish with a lime wheel

drinks.name: Pina Colada
drinks.description: A tropical fusion of rum, coconut, and pineapple
drinks.longDescription: The Piña Colada is a sweet cocktail made with rum, coconut cream, and pineapple juice. It's often served blended or shaken with ice.
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender
Blend until smooth
Pour into a tall glass
Garnish with a pineapple wedge and cherry

drinks.name: Strawberry Daiquiri
drinks.description: A fruity frozen rum cocktail
drinks.longDescription: The Strawberry Daiquiri is a delicious blend of strawberries, rum, and lime. It's often served frozen and perfect for parties and summer fun.
instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth
Pour into a hurricane or cocktail glass
Garnish with a strawberry or lime wheel

drinks.name: Aperol Spritz
drinks.description: A sparkling Italian classic with orange notes
drinks.longDescription: The Aperol Spritz is a vibrant, slightly bitter cocktail that's become a happy-hour staple across Europe. Made with Aperol, Prosecco, and soda water.
instructions: Add ice to a wine glass
Pour in Aperol and Prosecco
Top with soda water
Garnish with an orange slice

drinks.name: Mimosa
drinks.description: Champagne and orange juice combo
drinks.longDescription: A Mimosa is a brunch favorite that combines sparkling wine and fresh orange juice. It’s bubbly, citrusy, and delightfully light.
recipe: 2 oz chilled Champagne or sparkling wine
instructions: Pour orange juice into a flute glass
Top with sparkling wine
Do not stir
Garnish with an orange twist (optional)

drinks.name: Tequila Sunrise
drinks.description: A vibrant tequila drink with orange and grenadine
drinks.longDescription: The Tequila Sunrise is known for its beautiful gradient of colors, resembling a sunrise. It's made with tequila, orange juice, and grenadine.
instructions: Fill glass with ice
Pour tequila and orange juice
Slowly add grenadine to settle at the bottom
Do not stir
Garnish with orange slice and cherry

drinks.name: Mai Tai
drinks.description: A tiki-style tropical rum cocktail
drinks.longDescription: The Mai Tai is a classic tiki cocktail featuring rum, lime, and orgeat. It’s fruity, zesty, and strong—perfect for a happy beach vibe.
instructions: Shake all ingredients except dark rum with ice
Strain into a glass with crushed ice
Float dark rum on top
Garnish with mint and lime

drinks.name: Sex on the Beach
drinks.description: Fruity, peachy, and beachy cocktail
drinks.longDescription: Sex on the Beach is a fun, fruity cocktail made with vodka, peach schnapps, orange, and cranberry juice—perfect for summer celebrations.
instructions: Fill a shaker with all ingredients and ice
Shake and strain into a highball glass over ice
Garnish with orange slice or cherry

drinks.name: Blue Lagoon
drinks.description: Electric blue vodka-based cocktail
drinks.longDescription: The Blue Lagoon is a bright and fun cocktail made with vodka, blue curaçao, and lemonade. It’s zesty, sweet, and visually stunning.
instructions: Add vodka and curaçao to a glass of ice
Top with lemonade
Stir gently
Garnish with a lemon wheel or cherry

drinks.name: Caipirinha
drinks.description: Brazil’s national cocktail with lime and cachaça
drinks.longDescription: The Caipirinha is a sweet-tart cocktail made with lime, sugar, and cachaça, a Brazilian spirit made from sugarcane. Refreshing and bold.
instructions: Muddle lime and sugar in a glass
Add cachaça and ice
Stir well

drinks.name: Paloma
drinks.description: A zesty mix of tequila and grapefruit soda
drinks.longDescription: The Paloma is a beloved Mexican cocktail made with tequila and grapefruit soda. It’s fizzy, tangy, and ultra-refreshing for a happy mood.
instructions: Rim glass with salt (optional)
Fill glass with ice
Add tequila and lime juice
Top with grapefruit soda
Stir and garnish with grapefruit slice

drinks.name: Red Wine
drinks.description: A smooth, full-bodied red to unwind
drinks.longDescription: Red wine is made from dark-colored grape varieties. It's rich in antioxidants and can have complex flavors depending on the grape and aging process.
recipe: Pour 5 oz of red wine into a wine glass
instructions: Choose your preferred red wine
Open the bottle and let it breathe for a few minutes
Pour into a wine glass
Swirl gently and enjoy

drinks.name: Whiskey Neat
drinks.description: Pure, unadulterated whiskey for sipping
drinks.longDescription: Whiskey neat refers to a straight pour of whiskey into a glass, served at room temperature without ice, water, or any mixer.
recipe: Pour 2 oz of whiskey into a whiskey glass
instructions: Choose your preferred whiskey
Pour into a whiskey glass
Let it sit for a moment to open up
Sip and savor slowly

drinks.name: Chamomile Tea
drinks.description: A soothing herbal infusion for ultimate relaxation
drinks.longDescription: Chamomile tea is an herbal tea made from dried chamomile flowers. It's known for its calming properties and is often consumed before bedtime.
recipe: Optional: honey or lemon to taste
instructions: Boil water
Place tea bag in a mug
Pour hot water over the tea bag
Steep for 3-5 minutes
Remove tea bag and add honey or lemon if desired

drinks.name: Hot Toddy
drinks.description: A warm whiskey drink to melt stress
drinks.longDescription: The Hot Toddy is a comforting cocktail made with whiskey, honey, lemon, and hot water. It’s a classic choice for cold nights or when you need something soothing.
instructions: Combine whiskey, honey, and lemon juice in a mug
Add hot water and stir until honey dissolves
Garnish with cinnamon stick or lemon slice
Sip slowly and relax

drinks.name: Earl Grey Tea
drinks.description: A calming black tea with bergamot aroma
drinks.longDescription: Earl Grey is a classic black tea flavored with oil from the rind of bergamot orange. It offers a smooth, citrusy taste ideal for a relaxing break.
instructions: Boil water and pour into a mug
Add tea bag and steep for 3-4 minutes
Add lemon or milk if preferred
Enjoy slowly with a book or soft music

drinks.name: Baileys on the Rocks
drinks.description: Creamy Irish liqueur over ice
drinks.longDescription: Baileys Irish Cream is a sweet and smooth liqueur made from Irish whiskey and cream. Served over ice, it’s perfect for unwinding after a long day.
instructions: Fill a glass with ice
Pour Baileys over ice
Stir gently if desired
Sip slowly and enjoy the creaminess

drinks.name: Golden Milk
drinks.description: Turmeric latte for cozy evenings
drinks.longDescription: Golden Milk is a warm, non-alcoholic drink made with milk, turmeric, and spices. It’s known for its anti-inflammatory properties and calming effect.
instructions: Warm milk in a saucepan
Whisk in turmeric, cinnamon, and black pepper
Simmer for 3-5 minutes
Sweeten with honey if desired
Pour into a mug and enjoy warm

drinks.name: Negroni
drinks.description: A bitter-smooth Italian classic
drinks.longDescription: The Negroni is a sophisticated cocktail made with gin, Campari, and sweet vermouth. It’s slightly bitter, aromatic, and perfect for winding down.
instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice in a mixing glass
Strain into a rocks glass with fresh ice
Garnish with orange peel

drinks.name: Peppermint Tea
drinks.description: A cool, calming herbal brew
drinks.longDescription: Peppermint tea is a naturally caffeine-free infusion known for its refreshing taste and ability to ease tension and support digestion.
instructions: Boil water and pour over tea bag in a cup
Steep for 5-7 minutes
Drink slowly to relax your body and mind

drinks.name: Port Wine
drinks.description: A sweet, rich after-dinner wine
drinks.longDescription: Port wine is a Portuguese fortified wine with sweet, rich flavors. It’s often sipped slowly as a dessert wine or paired with cheese.
recipe: Pour 3 oz of Port into a small wine glass
instructions: Choose a good-quality Port
Pour into a small wine or sherry glass
Enjoy slowly, ideally at room temperature

drinks.name: Warm Apple Cider
drinks.description: A spiced, cozy non-alcoholic treat
drinks.longDescription: Warm apple cider is a comforting drink made by heating apple juice with spices like cinnamon and cloves. It’s ideal for cold evenings and quiet moments.
instructions: Combine cider and spices in a saucepan
Simmer for 10 minutes (do not boil)
Strain and pour into a mug
Garnish with orange peel if desired

drinks.name: Brandy Snifter
drinks.description: A warm, aromatic spirit served in a snifter glass
drinks.longDescription: Brandy is a distilled spirit made from wine or fermented fruit juice. When served in a snifter and warmed by hand, it’s a slow-sipping drink perfect for relaxing.
instructions: Pour brandy into a snifter glass
Let it warm in your hand for a few minutes
Swirl gently and enjoy the aroma

drinks.name: Lavender Lemonade
drinks.description: A floral twist on a calming classic
drinks.longDescription: Lavender lemonade is a refreshing and soothing drink that blends the tartness of lemon with the calming scent of lavender. Perfect for relaxing afternoons.
recipe: 1/4 cup lavender syrup or steeped lavender tea
instructions: Mix lemon juice, lavender, and water in a pitcher
Sweeten to taste
Serve over ice with a lemon slice

drinks.name: Espresso Martini
drinks.description: A caffeinated cocktail to spark your night
drinks.longDescription: The Espresso Martini is a cold, coffee-flavored cocktail made with vodka, espresso coffee, coffee liqueur, and sugar syrup. It's rich, indulgent, and the perfect pick-me-up for a night out.

brands.name: Kahlúa
brands.description: A coffee liqueur that adds richness and depth

brands.name: Absolut Vodka
brands.description: A smooth vodka that blends well with coffee flavors

brands.name: Mr Black Coffee Liqueur
brands.description: An Australian coffee liqueur with a strong coffee kick

brands.name: Grey Goose Vodka
brands.description: A premium vodka for a luxurious Espresso Martini

instructions: Fill a shaker with ice
Add vodka, fresh espresso, coffee liqueur, and simple syrup
Shake vigorously for about 20 seconds
Strain into a chilled martini glass
Garnish with three coffee beans

drinks.name: Red Bull Vodka
drinks.description: A high-octane mix of energy drink and vodka
drinks.longDescription: Red Bull Vodka is a popular cocktail that combines the stimulating effects of an energy drink with the relaxing properties of vodka. It's known for providing a burst of energy.
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice
Pour in vodka
Top with Red Bull
Stir gently to combine
Garnish with a lemon wedge if desired

drinks.name: Long Island Iced Tea
drinks.description: A potent blend of multiple spirits
drinks.longDescription: The Long Island Iced Tea is a type of alcoholic mixed drink typically made with vodka, tequila, light rum, triple sec, gin, and a splash of cola. Despite its name, the drink contains no tea.
instructions: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice
Add all ingredients except cola
Shake well for about 10 seconds
Strain into a highball glass filled with ice
Top with a splash of cola
Garnish with a lemon wedge

drinks.name: Hot Chocolate
drinks.description: A warm, comforting cocoa hug
drinks.longDescription: Hot chocolate is a warm beverage made from shaved chocolate, melted chocolate or cocoa powder, heated milk or water, and sugar. It's often topped with whipped cream or marshmallows.
instructions: In a saucepan, whisk together cocoa powder, sugar, and salt
Gradually add milk while whisking to combine
Heat over medium heat, stirring frequently, until hot
Remove from heat and stir in vanilla extract if using
Pour into a mug and top with whipped cream or marshmallows if desired

drinks.name: Warm Milk with Honey
drinks.description: A soothing, sweet classic
drinks.longDescription: Warm milk with honey is a simple, comforting drink often used as a natural sleep aid. The combination of warm milk and honey is believed to have calming properties.

brands.name: Manuka honey
brands.description: Premium honey with potential health benefits

brands.name: Wildflower honey
brands.description: Flavorful honey from various flower sources

recipe: Optional: pinch of cinnamon or nutmeg
instructions: Heat milk in a small saucepan over medium heat until warm
Remove from heat and stir in honey until dissolved
Pour into a mug
Sprinkle with cinnamon or nutmeg if desired
Enjoy while warm

drinks.name: Herbal Tea
drinks.description: A calming blend of herbs to lift your spirits
drinks.longDescription: Herbal tea is a caffeine-free infusion made from various herbs, flowers, and spices. Different blends can offer various benefits, from relaxation to mood enhancement.

brands.name: Pukka
brands.description: Organic herbal teas with unique blends

recipe: 1 herbal tea bag or 1 tsp loose herbal tea
Optional: honey or lemon to taste
instructions: Boil water and let it cool for a minute
Place tea bag or loose tea in a mug
Pour hot water over the tea
Steep for 5-7 minutes, or according to package instructions
Remove tea bag or strain loose tea
Add honey or lemon if desired

drinks.name: Golden Turmeric Latte
drinks.description: A warm, spiced drink for comfort and healing
drinks.longDescription: Golden milk (or turmeric latte) is known for its anti-inflammatory properties and comforting warmth. It's a soothing choice when you're feeling low or under the weather.
instructions: Heat milk in a saucepan over medium heat
Whisk in turmeric, cinnamon, and pepper
Simmer for 5 minutes
Remove from heat, add sweetener, and stir
Serve in a cozy mug

drinks.name: Mulled Apple Cider
drinks.description: A warm hug in a mug
drinks.longDescription: Mulled apple cider is heated apple juice spiced with cinnamon, cloves, and citrus. It evokes cozy fall feelings and is perfect for curling up on quiet days.
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a pot
Simmer gently for 10–15 minutes
Strain and pour into a mug
Serve with an orange slice or cinnamon stick

drinks.name: Spiced Hot Toddy
drinks.description: A comforting whiskey cocktail for dreary days
drinks.longDescription: A hot toddy blends whiskey, honey, lemon, and hot water for a calming effect. It’s great for cold evenings or when you need warmth and a little lift.
instructions: Combine whiskey, honey, and lemon juice in a mug
Top with hot water and stir until honey dissolves
Garnish with cinnamon stick or lemon slice

drinks.name: Vanilla Steam
drinks.description: Warm milk and vanilla for pure comfort
drinks.longDescription: The vanilla steam is a simple warm milk drink with vanilla and light sweetness. It’s a popular caffeine-free option for winding down or emotional moments.
instructions: Heat milk in a small saucepan until steaming
Add vanilla and sweetener
Froth if desired
Serve in a warm mug and sip slowly

drinks.name: Amaretto Hot Cocoa
drinks.description: Chocolatey comfort with a nutty twist
drinks.longDescription: This indulgent twist on hot chocolate adds a splash of Amaretto liqueur for an almond flavor and a mellow buzz. Ideal for cozying up under a blanket.
instructions: Make hot cocoa with milk, cocoa, and sugar
Stir in Amaretto after removing from heat
Top with whipped cream if desired

drinks.name: Rose Tea
drinks.description: A fragrant floral tea to soothe emotions
drinks.longDescription: Rose tea is made from dried rose petals or buds. Its gentle floral aroma is known to relax the nervous system and uplift the mood.
instructions: Place rose petals in a teapot or infuser
Pour hot water and steep for 5–7 minutes
Strain into a mug and add sweetener if desired

drinks.name: Peanut Butter Banana Smoothie
drinks.description: Creamy and nostalgic energy lift
drinks.longDescription: This smoothie combines the comfort of banana and peanut butter with protein and healthy fats. It's ideal for emotional slumps when you still need fuel.
instructions: Add all ingredients to a blender
Blend until smooth and creamy
Serve chilled in a glass

drinks.name: Coconut Chai
drinks.description: Spiced tea with a tropical, creamy twist
drinks.longDescription: Coconut chai is a warm blend of black tea, spices, and creamy coconut milk. It’s grounding and aromatic — perfect for emotional rest.
instructions: Brew chai in hot water for 5 minutes
Warm coconut milk separately
Combine and stir gently
Serve with a sprinkle of cinnamon

drinks.name: Baileys and Coffee
drinks.description: Rich and warming with a touch of sweetness
drinks.longDescription: This cozy combination mixes hot coffee with Baileys Irish Cream for a creamy, indulgent pick-me-up. Great for rainy days and quiet reflection.
instructions: Brew your favorite coffee
Add Baileys and stir gently
Top with whipped cream if desired

drinks.name: Lavender Lemon Balm Tea
drinks.description: A soft floral-mint herbal tea to calm the mind
drinks.longDescription: Lavender and lemon balm together create a calming herbal blend that reduces anxiety and promotes emotional balance. Ideal for sad or stressful moments.
instructions: Combine herbs in a tea infuser or teapot
Pour over hot water and steep for 5–7 minutes
Strain and enjoy with a splash of honey if needed

drinks.name: Green Tea
drinks.description: A zen-inducing cup of antioxidants
drinks.longDescription: Green tea is a type of tea made from Camellia sinensis leaves that have not undergone the same withering and oxidation process used to make oolong and black tea. It's known for its health benefits and calming properties.
recipe: 1 tsp green tea leaves or 1 green tea bag
Optional: honey or lemon to taste
instructions: Heat water to 175°F/80°C (just before boiling)
Place tea leaves in a teapot or tea bag in a mug
Pour hot water over the tea
Steep for 1-3 minutes, depending on desired strength
Strain leaves or remove tea bag
Add honey or lemon if desired

drinks.name: Lavender Latte
drinks.description: A calming, floral coffee experience
drinks.longDescription: A Lavender Latte is a soothing coffee drink that combines espresso with steamed milk and lavender syrup. The floral notes of lavender pair well with the rich coffee, creating a unique and relaxing beverage.

brands.name: Homemade
brands.description: DIY lavender syrup for a personalized touch

brands.name: Local cafe specialty
brands.description: Unique blends from local coffee shops

recipe: 1 shot espresso or 1/2 cup strong brewed coffee
instructions: Brew espresso or strong coffee
Steam milk until frothy
In a mug, combine espresso and lavender syrup
Pour steamed milk over the coffee, holding back the foam
Spoon milk foam on top
Garnish with dried lavender buds if desired

drinks.name: Cucumber Water
drinks.description: A refreshing, hydrating stress-reliever
drinks.longDescription: Cucumber water is a simple, refreshing drink made by infusing water with fresh cucumber slices. It's known for its hydrating properties and subtle, crisp flavor that can help reduce stress and promote relaxation.

brands.name: Hint
brands.description: Flavored water brand with cucumber option

recipe: Optional: fresh mint leaves or lemon slices
instructions: Wash cucumber thoroughly and slice thinly
Place cucumber slices in a pitcher
Add mint leaves or lemon slices if using
Fill the pitcher with cold water
Refrigerate for at least 1 hour to infuse
Serve over ice and enjoy

drinks.name: Ashwagandha Moon Milk
drinks.description: An adaptogenic bedtime drink for stress relief
drinks.longDescription: Moon milk made with ashwagandha helps the body adapt to stress and supports sleep. With warm milk, honey, and calming spices, it's a relaxing nighttime ritual.
recipe: Optional: pinch of nutmeg or cardamom
instructions: Warm milk in a saucepan
Whisk in ashwagandha and spices
Simmer for 5 minutes on low heat
Sweeten with honey and serve warm

drinks.name: Chamomile & Honey Tea
drinks.description: A gentle herbal blend to calm nerves
drinks.longDescription: Chamomile tea has natural sedative properties and is commonly used for reducing anxiety. Adding honey enhances its soothing effect.
instructions: Boil water and steep tea bag for 5–7 minutes
Remove tea bag and stir in honey
Sip slowly, preferably in a quiet space

drinks.name: Peppermint & Lemon Balm Infusion
drinks.description: Cooling and calming herbal combo
drinks.longDescription: Peppermint and lemon balm are both known to ease digestive tension and reduce stress. Together they make a refreshing, relaxing tea.
instructions: Add herbs to a tea infuser or teapot
Pour hot water and steep for 5–10 minutes
Strain and sweeten if desired

drinks.name: Sparkling Magnesium Water
drinks.description: Hydrating with a mineral stress reliever
drinks.longDescription: Magnesium helps relax the nervous system. Sparkling magnesium water combines light bubbles with calming minerals, ideal during high-stress moments.
recipe: 1 scoop magnesium powder (unflavored or lightly flavored)
instructions: Dissolve magnesium in sparkling water
Stir gently and serve over ice
Sip slowly

drinks.name: Honey Lemon Ginger Tea
drinks.description: A spicy-sweet natural stress soother
drinks.longDescription: Ginger helps reduce inflammation and improve circulation, while lemon and honey soothe the senses. A perfect drink for when stress shows up physically.
instructions: Steep ginger in hot water for 5 minutes
Strain and add lemon juice and honey
Stir and serve hot

drinks.name: Coconut Water with Mint
drinks.description: Lightly sweet, electrolyte-rich calm
drinks.longDescription: Coconut water replenishes electrolytes and supports hydration. Adding mint makes it more refreshing and uplifting when under mental pressure.
instructions: Add mint leaves to a glass and gently muddle
Pour in chilled coconut water
Add ice and stir

drinks.name: Oat Milk Chai
drinks.description: A creamy, spiced comfort drink
drinks.longDescription: Chai spices like cardamom and cinnamon are warming and calming. Using oat milk makes this drink creamy, grounding, and perfect for reducing tension.
recipe: 1 chai tea bag or 1 tsp loose chai
Optional: dash of cinnamon or vanilla
instructions: Steep chai in hot water for 5 minutes
Heat oat milk separately
Combine and garnish with cinnamon

drinks.name: Passionflower Tea
drinks.description: Natural herb for easing anxious tension
drinks.longDescription: Passionflower is known for reducing anxiety and improving sleep quality. It’s a great herbal tea choice during emotionally intense moments.
recipe: 1 tsp dried passionflower or 1 tea bag
instructions: Steep tea bag or herb in hot water for 5–10 minutes
Strain and enjoy warm
Best taken in the evening or after work

drinks.name: Iced Rose Lemonade
drinks.description: Floral and citrusy — calming and refreshing
drinks.longDescription: Rose water adds floral tranquility, while lemon provides brightness. Together, they create a cooling drink that calms both the body and the mind.
recipe: 1 cup cold water or sparkling water
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a glass
Stir well and add ice
Garnish with mint or rose petals

drinks.name: Adaptogen Smoothie
drinks.description: A nutrient-packed blend to balance cortisol
drinks.longDescription: Made with stress-fighting ingredients like maca, ashwagandha, banana, and almond butter, this smoothie nourishes the nervous system and restores energy.
instructions: Add all ingredients to a blender
Blend until smooth and creamy
Serve immediately for best flavor

drinks.name: Champagne
drinks.description: Bubbly elegance for special moments
drinks.longDescription: Champagne is a sparkling wine produced from grapes grown in the Champagne region of northeastern France. It's associated with luxury and celebration, making it perfect for romantic occasions.
recipe: Chill Champagne bottle for at least 3 hours
instructions: Remove Champagne from refrigerator
Carefully remove the foil and wire cage
Hold the bottle at a 45-degree angle
Slowly twist the bottle, not the cork, until it releases with a gentle hiss
Pour into fluted Champagne glasses
Serve immediately to enjoy the bubbles

drinks.name: Rosé Wine
drinks.description: A pink, fruity wine for romantic evenings
drinks.longDescription: Rosé wine is a type of wine that incorporates some of the color from the grape skins, but not enough to qualify it as a red wine. It's known for its pink color and refreshing taste, perfect for romantic settings.
recipe: Chill rosé wine for 2-3 hours before serving
instructions: Remove rosé from refrigerator
Open the bottle
Pour into wine glasses, filling about 1/3 full
Serve and enjoy at a temperature between 50-60°F (10-15°C)

drinks.name: Whiskey Cocktail
drinks.description: A sophisticated blend for a romantic night
drinks.longDescription: A whiskey cocktail can be a variety of mixed drinks with whiskey as the primary ingredient. For a romantic setting, consider a classic like an Old Fashioned or a Manhattan, which offer a perfect balance of flavors.
instructions: In a mixing glass, combine whiskey, simple syrup, and bitters
Add ice and stir until well-chilled
Strain into a rocks glass over a large ice cube
Express the oils of an orange peel over the drink
Garnish with the orange peel and serve

drinks.name: Strawberry Bellini
drinks.description: A fruity, bubbly cocktail for sweet moments
drinks.longDescription: The Strawberry Bellini is a romantic twist on the classic Bellini, blending fresh strawberries and Prosecco. It's vibrant, sweet, and perfect for brunch dates or special toasts.
instructions: Add strawberry purée to a Champagne flute
Slowly top with Prosecco
Gently stir to mix
Garnish with a strawberry slice

drinks.name: Red Sangria
drinks.description: A vibrant wine punch with a fruity twist
drinks.longDescription: Red Sangria is a shareable Spanish drink made from red wine, fresh fruits, and a touch of brandy. It’s colorful, fun, and ideal for romantic summer evenings.
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a large pitcher
Refrigerate for at least 2 hours
Serve over ice in wine glasses

drinks.name: Pink Gin & Tonic
drinks.description: A flirty twist on the classic G&T
drinks.longDescription: Pink gin adds a delicate, fruity note to the standard gin and tonic. It's crisp, lightly sweet, and visually stunning — great for a romantic toast.
recipe: Fresh berries or grapefruit for garnish
instructions: Fill a balloon glass with ice
Pour in pink gin and tonic
Stir gently and garnish

drinks.name: Chocolate Martini
drinks.description: Decadent dessert in a glass
drinks.longDescription: The Chocolate Martini is rich, silky, and perfect for dessert. Made with vodka and chocolate liqueur, it’s a drink to share over slow sips and soft music.
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice
Strain into a chilled martini glass
Garnish with chocolate shavings or syrup

drinks.name: Rose Lemonade
drinks.description: A floral, non-alcoholic delight
drinks.longDescription: Rose lemonade is a fragrant and refreshing drink, blending delicate rose water with tangy lemon. It's non-alcoholic and perfect for gentle, romantic moments.
instructions: Mix lemon juice, rose water, and sugar
Top with sparkling water
Serve over ice with rose petals or lemon twist

drinks.name: French 75
drinks.description: A bubbly cocktail with a citrus spark
drinks.longDescription: The French 75 combines gin, lemon juice, sugar, and Champagne for an elegant, uplifting drink with a slightly tart finish — perfect for romantic dinners.
instructions: Shake gin, lemon, and syrup with ice
Strain into a flute
Top with Champagne
Garnish with a lemon twist

drinks.name: Strawberry Milkshake
drinks.description: Sweet, creamy, and shareable
drinks.longDescription: A classic strawberry milkshake is a nostalgic and sweet non-alcoholic treat. Great for sharing with two straws and smiles.
instructions: Blend strawberries, ice cream, and milk
Pour into a tall glass
Top with whipped cream and serve with two straws

drinks.name: Mulled Wine
drinks.description: Warm and spiced for winter romance
drinks.longDescription: Mulled wine is a cozy, festive drink made with red wine, spices, and citrus. Perfect for romantic nights by the fire or cold-weather cuddles.

brands.name: Garnacha
brands.description: Spanish red wine great for mulling

instructions: Combine ingredients in a pot
Simmer gently (do not boil) for 15 minutes
Strain and serve warm in mugs

drinks.name: Affogato
drinks.description: A romantic Italian dessert drink
drinks.longDescription: Affogato is an Italian dessert-drink made by pouring hot espresso over cold vanilla gelato or ice cream. It’s simple, indulgent, and ideal for post-dinner romance.
recipe: 1 scoop vanilla ice cream or gelato
instructions: Place scoop of ice cream in a dessert glass
Pour hot espresso over it just before serving
Enjoy immediately with a spoon

drinks.name: Kir Royale
drinks.description: A French classic with berry sweetness
drinks.longDescription: Kir Royale is a simple yet elegant cocktail made by adding crème de cassis (blackcurrant liqueur) to Champagne. It’s rich, fruity, and sparkling — ideal for romantic toasts.
instructions: Pour crème de cassis into a flute
Top gently with Champagne
Serve without stirring

drinks.name: Cosmopolitan
drinks.description: A vibrant, fruity cocktail perfect for celebrations
drinks.longDescription: The Cosmopolitan is a vodka-based cocktail that combines the kick of citrus with the sweetness of cranberry. It's a perfect drink for those exciting moments when you want to celebrate life.

brands.name: Absolut Citron
brands.description: A citrus-flavored vodka that forms the base of a great Cosmo

brands.name: Cointreau
